title: Argentine Tango - Los Angeles
name: Argentine Tango - Los Angeles
description:
A Map by Sdelayne

Milongas, practicas, and classes in and around Los Angeles, CA.

properties.name: FRI - Avant Garde Ballroom
properties.description: Posted by Sdelayne4220 Scott Drive, Newport Beach, CA. 92660Claudio and Veronica Rubio are inviting you to spend an evening with them! Day/Time: Fridays (1st Friday of every month) 8:00 pm - 9:00 pm - Class 9:00 pm - 1:00 am - Milonga

properties.name: FRI - El Abrazo
properties.description: Posted by Sdelayne817 North Highland Avenue, Los Angeles, California 90038Dance like in Buenos Aires to the best Orchestras! Friendly atmosphere provided by your hostesses, The Divas from Buenos Aires: Monica Orozco and Anamaria Menendez Milonga from 9:30PM to 1:00AM for just 0!! Includes wine, snacks, drinks and the best dancing this side of Buenos Aires!. Day/Time: Fridays 8:30 pm - 9:30 pm - Class by Monica Orozco 9:30 pm - 1:00 am - Dance

properties.name: FRI - Long Beach Milonga
properties.description: Posted by Sdelayne  530 East 4th Street, Long Beach, CA 90802 Free parking on the street and four adjacent parking lots. Free snacks and drinks. Nice, large dance floor. properties.name: FRI - Michael's Bailongo
properties.description: Posted by Sdelayne1941 Westwood Boulevard, Los Angeles, California 90025Neal La Grange cross-street behind the restaurant. Snacks, drinks, coffee, wine, raffle... Tango, Milonga, Vals, Salsa, Swing, Foxtrot. Beautiful medium-sized dance floor. Dance and classes 5, Classes only 0, Dance only 0. Day/Time: Fridays 8:00 pm - 8:45 pm - Beginner Class 8:45 pm - 9:30 pm - Intermediate Class 9:30 pm - 1 am - Dance For more info call: (818) 996-1228

properties.name: MON - Makela's Practica
properties.description: Posted by Sdelayne1416 Electric Avenue. Venice. CA. 90291Supervised practica every Monday night with Makela Brizuela at the "Electric Lodge". 1416 Electric Avenue. Venice. CA. 90291 (From Lincoln Blvd, go west on Venice, right on Abott Kinney, right on California, right on Electric) FREE PARKING LOT! Admission: Practica: 0.00 Day/Time: Mondays 7:00 pm - 9:00 - Practica For more info call: Tel: (310) 740-2007 Email: Makbriz@aol.com

properties.name: SAT- El Encuentro
properties.description: Posted by Sdelayne4346 Woodman Ave. Sherman Oaks, CA Beautiful "Tango Room" dance studio, free snacks and soft drinks, much well-lit parking on street and behind the building. Several nice restaurants nearby. Beautiful, medium-sized floor. Hosted by Alexis and Angel. Day/Time: Saturdays 10 pm - 2 am - Dance For more info call: Organized by: Julie, Angel, Alexis, and Barbara (818) 997-9419 or (818) 606-5895 Or send email to: latango@hotmail.com

properties.name: THU - Monica's Milonga
properties.description: Posted by Sdelayne2100 North Gleanoaks Blvd. Burbank, CA 91504Come and join me for the experience of theTango . . . The Sensuality, the Spirit and the Multicultural Dimensions. The Tango is a dance like none other. It is an entity of light, of joy and of healing for the Soul. An experience that will enrich your life! Day/Time: Thursdays 8:00 - Midnight For more info call: 213-880-2552 or 310-273-6650 Email: tangopower@sbcglobal.net

properties.name: TUE - Bailongo De Los Martes
properties.description: Posted by Sdelayne4346 Woodman Ave. Sherman Oaks, California"Bailongo De Los Martes" - (Sherman Oaks) 4346 Woodman Ave. Sherman Oaks, California Tel: (818) 606 5895 A space to dance or socialize with one hundred of your best Tango friends. Whether you are into ‘milonguero’, ‘tango nuevo’, or simply want to pick up a few moves, the bailongo (‘a place to dance’ in the Argentinean slang called lunfardo) has all the elements to make for a highly satisfying night of tango: a variety of styles and levels, a number of good dancers (with a decent gender balance) willing to dance with everyone, and a friendly, relaxed atmosphere. The night is DJ\'d by Edmundo, who brings a wealth of knowledge and good taste to the rare and fine art of playing great, danceable tangos, milongas and vals from the 30\'s through today. Admission: Day/Time: Tuesdays 9:00 pm - Midnight For more info call: Tel: (818) 606.5895 Tel: (818) 997.9419 Email: LATango@hotmail.com

properties.name: TUE - Felix Chavez's El Jardin De Las Flores
properties.description: Posted by Sdelayne17337 Ventura Blvd. Encino, CA Felix Chavez\'s "El Jardin De Las Flores" - (Encino) 17337 Ventura Blvd. Encino, CA Tel: (818) 907-7757 Join Felix and Barbara for a night of Tango at the beautiful Maykadeh restaurant in Encino. Day/Time: Tuesdays 7:00 pm - 8:30 pm (Class) 8:30 pm - Midnight (Milonga) Admission: 4.00 0.00 With dinner or if you are a student of the Maestro. For more info call: Tel: (818) 692-7828 Tel: (818) 907-7757

properties.name: TUE - Vladi & Peri's Practica
properties.description: Posted by Sdelayne8558 West 3rd Street, Los Angeles, California 90048Vladi\'s and Peri\'s Practica - (Beverly Hills) 8558 West 3rd Street, Los Angeles, California 90048 Tel: (310) 275-4683 Located at 3rd Street Dance studio. All levels welcomed! Relaxed and friendly atmosphere! Bring a partner or come alone. There is parking in the rear of the building. We also validate parking on the N/W corner of Sherbourne & 3rd St. just west of studio. Admission: .00 Day/Time: Tuesdays 8:30 pm - 11:00 pm - Practica

properties.name: WED - El Baron
properties.description: Posted by Sdelayne8641 W. Washington Blvd., Culver City, CAClub "EL BARON" (former Club Tropical) is the new home for The Los Angeles Tango Trio, where they\'ll be playing each week. The club has a beautiful dance floor and incredible Salvadoran food. Music and dancing starts at 8:30. The Los Angeles Tango Trio: Pablo Motta - Bass Marcelo Cacres - Guitar Sam Robles - Alto Sax Class: All-levels class taught by Yolanda Rossi and Miguel Cardoso. 7:30 PM - 8:30 PM Admission: Class - 0.00 Milonga - 0.00 Day/Time: Wednesdays 7:30 PM - 8:30 PM - Class 8:30 PM - Midnight - Milonga Fore More Info: Tel: (818) 231-2565 Email: mottapablo@yahoo.com
